testcase.name: class_inside_pojo_package_should_have_name_annotated_with_entity

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Architecture Violation [Priority: MEDIUM] - Rule 'classes that reside in a package '..repo..' should be annotated with @Entity' was violated (2 times): Class <com.app.repo.StudentRepo> is not annotated with @Entity in (StudentRepo.java:0) Class <com.app.repo.TeacherRepo> is not annotated with @Entity in (TeacherRepo.java:0)
